sections.code:
.Lub,
	.TC,
	.TR,
	.WR,
	.Xa,
	.bS,
	.l4a,
	.vy {
		background-color: transparent
	}
	.IO,
	.WdjWF,
	.WpuQke,
	.aac,
	.cp,
	.tQb,
	.ve,
	.wu,
	.xac {
		background-color: #2a2a2d
	}
	.fr,
	.qac {
		background-color: #222225
	}
	.Fr+.bj,
	.Fr>.Qp,
	.IO,
	.cp,
	.fr>.vt,
	.wu {
		border-color: #3a3a40
	}
	.Kza,
	.MNn0h,
	.d-r,
	.f4a.tta,
	.nfe {
		background-color: #3a3a40
	}
	.d-A-u,
	.d-A-yb,
	.l4a:active .f4a {
		background-color: #4a4a50
	}
	.Gc.esw,
	.Id>.eswd {
		background-color: #3a3a40
	}
	.Id>.eswd {
		color: #ccc;
		border-color: #4a4a50
	}
	.Gc.esw {
		border-color: #46464f
	}
	.Dg:hover,
	.Gc.eswd:hover {
		border-color: #52525f
	}
	.Iac,
	.Oub.d-r-Gk .d-A,
	.Ub,
	.bS,
	.cp,
	.d-A-u .d-A-B,
	.d-A-yb .d-A-B,
	.k4a,
	.ot-hashtag,
	.proflink,
	.sQb:link,
	.sQb:visited,
	.tta .Jub,
	.vy,
	.xQb {
		color: #ccc
	}
	.Aq,
	.MNn0h.RATVS .YGETNc,
	.MNn0h:hover .YGETNc,
	.SR,
	.YGETNc,
	.bhsVm,
	.dR.d-s,
	.dn,
	.nYXukb,
	.tf,
	.tta .Gub,
	.tta .Hub,
	.y9fV .YGETNc {
		color: #999
	}
	.MNn0h.RATVS,
	.MNn0h:hover {
		background-color: #3c3c42
	}
	.TR,
	.bxpCne,
	.eswd .sm,
	.gr,
	.hhb,
	.khb,
	.nV46l,
	.tubEcf,
	.vwa {
		filter: invert(.7) brightness(3)
	}
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
*{transition-timing-function:ease;transition-duration:.25s;transition-property:border-color,background-color,color,box-shadow,opacity}

.button{border-color:#276;background:#276}
  .button:active,.button:hover{border-color:#298;background:#298}

.block .mainer{background-color: #000 !important;}
.block{background-color: #000 !important;}
span{color:#ddd !important}

name: Acfun 黑色模式 夜晚模式 Dark Theme 2016.12.27
